evidence.title: What Is Jane Street Really Doing? Terraform Allegations, Bitcoin Sale, MSTR Buys
evidence.summary: Legal allegations and aggressive asset sales may impact investor confidence.

key_points: Jane Street faces a lawsuit alleging insider trading related to the Terra Luna collapse.
The firm has been selling Bitcoin aggressively in the U.S.
raw.why_it_moves: Legal allegations and aggressive asset sales may impact investor confidence.

decisions.rationale: 近期有法律诉讼和比特币抛售的负面新闻，可能影响投资者信心。当前市场情绪偏向谨慎。
decisions.valuation_view: 尚未确定公允价值区间
counterfactuals: 如果有正面的公司公告或市场情绪改善，可能会改变当前持有立场
next_checks: 等待更多企业公告以评估长期方向性
